title: Data Engineer
bullets: Architected and delivered an enterprise Data & AI platform serving six business units, enabling governed warehouses, streaming pipelines, and ML infrastructure on GCP. Improved query latency by 40% and throughput by 35% across 100+ TB/day workloads.

Standardized ingestion frameworks (CDC, API, SFTP, batch) to enable one-click onboarding of 50+ data sources and operate 1,000+ production tables in BigQuery. Served as interim operational lead ensuring SLA adherence and platform reliability.

Re-architected batch pipelines into streaming-first architectures using Datastream and Dataflow, reducing data availability from days to seconds while implementing incremental merge, deduplication, and reconciliation frameworks to achieve 99.8% data accuracy.

Built a self-service access management platform and organization-wide observability layer (freshness SLAs, anomaly detection, cost attribution), cutting access provisioning from two days to seconds and reducing cloud costs by up to 80%.

Developed production AI pipelines using Document AI and Vertex AI to extract structured data from 10K+ monthly invoices with 98% accuracy, reducing manual processing time by 75% and accelerating downstream analytics.

Architected a privacy-aware, low-latency voice interaction system using an on-device TFLite wake-word model, noise suppression, and Whisper-based STT, enabling hands-free access to secure internal AI agents and real-time TTS responses.

title: Machine Learning Researcher
bullets: Conducted research on fairness in multi-agent reinforcement learning, designing algorithms that balance individual and collective rewards under constrained environments. Demonstrated improved coordination and equity using DDQN and PPO in custom simulation frameworks.

Optimized traffic flow in smart-city environments by modeling traffic signals as learning agents and applying deep RL (Actor-Critic, PPO) in the SUMO simulator, reducing congestion and improving system-wide efficiency through adaptive policy learning.

title: Software Engineer
bullets: Built batch and backend microservices to automate SOP workflows, reducing manual effort by 90% and saving over 100 engineering hours per month through optimized SQL pipelines and service orchestration.

Implemented concurrency and multithreading strategies that increased service throughput from 500 to 1,100 TPS (+120%) and reduced batch execution time by 50%. Integrated Python-based ML models into production systems supporting real-time clinical decision workflows.

Led backend engineering initiatives by defining coding standards, reviewing system designs, and establishing best practices for scalable services, contributing to production-grade platforms that supported physicians and clinical operations.
